site_name: Albert Memorial, Kensington Gore, London, SW7 2AP
description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application received by The City of Westminster for: Use of part of East Albert Lawn, Kensington Gardens as a temporary exhibition event space for a temporary period from 10th May to 8th October 2021; including the erection of a temporary structure and ancillary services. Van Gogh Alive - an immersive, digital art exhibition - will be open to the public from 2nd June to 26th September 2021 with access via pre-booked, timed entry tickets to control capacity and allow for any COVID-19 social distancing measures in place at the time. Included within the structure will be a cafe and merchandise area.
